snippet: The race for the final two Champions League berths in the Premier League tightened when Everton sent Tottenham to its third straight league loss and Chelsea defeated Stoke.
abstract: Everton defeats Tottenham, 1-0, tightening the race for the final two Champions League berths in the Premier League; Chelsea defeats Stoke, 1-0; other soccer results noted.
lead_paragraph: The race for the final two Champions League berths in the Premier League tightened when Everton sent Tottenham to its third straight league loss and Chelsea defeated Stoke.
